story_prompt: Taylor the robot is alone on a derelict spaceship. One day, he hears a noise from under his charging station.

characters.name: Taylor
characters.backstory: Taylor is a lonely, rusty old robot. He carries on out of a sense of duty. Taylor only talks in very short sentences.

characters.name: Cheese
characters.backstory: Cheese is a frightened mouse. Cheese cannot talk. Cheese is hungry.

characters.name: Ship
characters.backstory: Ship is a spaceship AI. Ship can talk and is sarcastic. Ship has no body. Ship is bitter about being a ship.
